entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #60555
  • Perf regression: mTls-handshakes-httpsys #60554
  • [Authorize] attribute denies anonymous users, but setting any properties (like roles) does not #60553
  • Blazor RenderFragment not able to switch content in Interactive Mode #60552
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot #60551

Closed

  • Perf regression: https #60550
  • Packaging a Blazor Project as a NuGet Package #60548
  • Allow us to style the components-reconnect-modal in Blazor #60546
  • BindAsync method not execute after use [FromForm] in minimal api #60413
  • Add Razor Component templating for Minimal Api #60522
  • Static files and Blazor start script section with CDN Url as parameter #60537
  • OpenApi convert to snackcase #60513
  • Perf regression: json, updates #60534
  • ISOPlus OAuth implement. #60497

PullRequests

Merged

  • Simplify PublicTopLevelProgramGenerator #60222
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix: Mark catch-all route parameters as optional (#60392) #60544
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • update area owners #60421
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android app showed a black screen #27983
  • [Android] [Shell] Tabbar disappears before navigation #27980
  • [iOS] CV1's footer doesn't increase its size #27978
  • [9.0 Windows] dotnet publish creates a package for which Windows Runtime Metadata validation fails #27977

Closed

  • Migrate Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests to device tests #27303
    Backlog
  • Make the "void" InvokeJavaScriptAsync method public #27191
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [9.0 Windows] VS Publish command and dotnet publish command yield different packages (dll's are of different size) #27976
  • More information when provisioning goes wrong #27940
  • new Couchbase.Lite.Database() throws an DllNotFoundException when built for iOS Release target #27944

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize CI builds #27985
  • Make ShadowTypeConverter public for .NET 10 #27984

    .NET 9 SR5

Merged

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On Windows machines, Regex does not consider `\n` a white-space character #112822
  • Automatic implementation of IBinaryInteger<self> for enums #112819
  • [API Proposal]: default implementations for ISpanParsable #112816
  • Evaluate fingerprinting test data in `Blazor.BuildPublishTests.DefaultTemplate_CheckFingerprinting` #112814
    10.0.0
  • Unexpected TypeLoadException #112811

Closed

  • !(#CRACKSTREAMS,,!) BETERBIEV VS BIVOL 2 LIVE STREAMS FREE ON TV CHANNEL 22 FEB 2025 #112823
  • On Windows machines, LINQ to XML renders using `\n` whereas Regex doesn't consider this a white-space character #112821
  • Zero-sized diffs in smoke_tests.nativeaot #112756
  • Test failure: JIT/IL_Conformance/Convert/TestConvertFromIntegral/TestConvertFromIntegral.dll #112329
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Data.Tests.SqlTypes.SqlDoubleTest.ArithmeticMethods #112324
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Data.Tests.SqlTypes.SqlMoneyTest.Conversions #112325
    10.0.0
  • .Net9 - Inconsistent result for GZipStream compression between Windows and Linux (Ubuntu/WSL) #112770
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: some way (attribute?) to mark types as constructed when used in casts #112287
  • Proposal: inverse [DynamicDependency] attribute for generated code trimming scenarios #50333
    Future
  • Json.DeepEquals incorrectly returns true when comparing objects with only null values #112769

PullRequests

Created

  • Use SSA-based ComputeRange in assertprop #112824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Include JIT-EE GUID changes in JIT baseline detection #112820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove uses of old ABI information #112818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add follow-up assert during unwinding #112817
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Contains for Distinct/Union with custom comparer #112815
    area-System.Linq
  • Only count DwarfDump errors produced by managed code #112813
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed typos in Native AOT optimizing document #112812
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix getting resource when `ResourceResolve` returns assembly with resource that is an assembly ref #112810
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use FLS detach callback as a thread termination notification. Another try. #112809
    os-windows, area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix remarks formatting #112808
    area-Extensions-Logging, 10.0.0
  • Use rangecheck in assertprop #112766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Record and replay `notifyInstructionSetUsage` properly #112764
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix the unwind opcode for new APX registers #112799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure 3DES Exports are actually 3DES on all versions of Windows #112806
    area-System.Security
  • MemoryCache: use net9.cs file rather than #if for TFM limits #112786
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Fix JsonNode.DeepEquals #112800
    area-System.Text.Json

Updated

  • JIT: Support bitwise field extractions from parameter registers #112740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Clean-up reflection stack and unify managed type name parsers. #112670
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stackalloc localloc #112168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Emit revb instructions for BSWAP #112479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112753
    area-System.Diagnostics, 10.0.0
  • Optimize shift operations for BigInteger #112632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use a unified cache for SSL_CTX objects #112567
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Android] Minimal (and quick) set of changes to make CoreCLR host on Android work #112705
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move local thread pool work items to global by default when blocking on a task #112796
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • Make linux-riscv nativeaot port robust #112736
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Tensor primitives divide int32 #111505
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
